gameview.sView

Class SPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameview.sView.SPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISPlayer

    public class SPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISPlayer
    This class is an container for the player settings. The created object will be send by the NewPlayerSetPropertiesEvent.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A.
